Name: Escape Chase Zombie
About the game: 'Escape & Chase Zombie' is action game where you collect spheres on the map while escaping from zombies. zombies use their very smart brains to chase you. Over 150 maps Over 50 unique AI enemies such as ghosts, ninjas and aliens Escape from zombies with your instant judgment & selected items!!
